EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.SF Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for attending the SpringOne Tour 2018 in San Francisco!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for coming out to San Francisco earlier last week to participate and enhance our community. Looking for slides from SpringOne Tour? You can find them, along with blogs, videos and all things Spring related here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/springone-tour-san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-sf-q418]]>.
In the meantime, get started <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-sf-q418]]> with Spring on Cloud Foundry: for free on the public cloud, or on your workstation.
I hope to see you again soon at a future event!
Thanks, Tasha Isenberg tisenberg@pivotal.io <[[mailto:tisenberg@pivotal.io]]>
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/GAU0JW200t0BI0CN00000A0]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>.
